opendial.inference.exact

Class NaiveInference

  • java.lang.Object
    • opendial.inference.exact.NaiveInference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InferenceAlgorithm

    public class NaiveInference
extends java.lang.Object
implements InferenceAlgorithm
    Algorithm for naive probabilistic inference, based on computing the full joint distribution, and then summing everything.
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)

      • reduce

        public BNetwork reduce(Query.ReduceQuery query)
        Reduces the Bayesian network to a subset of its variables. This reduction operates here by generating the possible conditional assignments for every retained variables, and calculating the distribution for each assignment.
        Specified by:
        reduce in interface InferenceAlgorithm
        Parameters:
        query - the reduction query
        Returns:
        the reduced network
